Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="TDCLanguagesDataSet" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Label" Type="System.String" Value="UpdateTDCLanguages;{4};SPA"/> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Msmq"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="TDCLanguagesDataTable"> <Columns> <Column Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="TERMINAL_DEVICE_CONTRACT_ID" Type="System.Int64"/> <Column Name="LANG" Type="System.Int16"/> <Column Name="SMS_USSD_LANG" Type="System.Int16"/> </Columns> <Rows> <Row REQUEST_ID="reversecut({0},4)-{4}" TERMINAL_DEVICE_CONTRACT_ID="{2}" LANG="{3}" SMS_USSD_LANG="{3}"/> </Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
